briefTitle: Intercostal Nerve Block With Liposome Bupivacaine in Subjects Undergoing Posterolateral Thoracotomy
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Placebo Controlled Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Intercostal Nerve Block With Liposome Bupivacaine in Subjects Undergoing Posterolateral Thoracotomy
summary: The purpose of the study is to examine the safety and efficacy of liposome bupivacaine for intercostal nerve block in subjects undergoing posterolateral thoracotomy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC) of Pain Intensity at Rest Through 72 Hours
